meanings.definition: To process (ores or other raw materials) for profit.
meanings.sent1: The company beneficiates iron ore to make steel.
meanings.sent2: The factory beneficiates copper to extract valuable minerals.
meanings.sent3: The clever miner beneficiates the rocks into shiny treasures.
meanings.sent4: She beneficiates the information she gathers to create valuable insights.
meanings.sent5: The machine beneficiates the raw materials with precision and efficiency.

meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables beneficiates your health.
meanings.sent2: Exercising regularly beneficiates your overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: His decision to study hard beneficiates his future opportunities.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude beneficiates her relationships with others.
meanings.sent5: Being kind and helpful beneficiates the community as a whole.
